  @Input() multiSelectable = false;

  @Input() cellTemplate: TemplateRef<any> | CellTemplate;

  @Input() showContextMenu = false;
  @Input() contextMenuItems: ContextMenuItem[] = [];

  @Input() columns: ColumnDef[] = [];

  @Output() sortChange = new EventEmitter<SortEvent>();
  @Output() selectionChange = new EventEmitter<ListMockItem[]>();
  @Output() contextMenuItemSelected = new EventEmitter<{ itemId: string; rowData: ListMockItem }>();

    this.columns = [
{ field: 'id', header: 'Id', hide: true, sortable: true },
{ field: 'name', header: 'Name', hide: false, sortable: false },
